thread.title: BRIEF-Automodular And Hls Receive Shareholder And Court Approval For Plan Of Arrangement

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Automodular And Hls Receive Shareholder And Court Approval For Plan Of Arrangement
text: March 8, 2018 / 7:22 PM / in 12 minutes BRIEF-Automodular And Hls Receive Shareholder And Court Approval For Plan Of Arrangement Reuters Staff March 8 (Reuters) - Automodular Corp: * AUTOMODULAR AND HLS RECEIVE SHAREHOLDER AND COURT APPROVAL FOR PLAN OF ARRANGEMENT * AUTOMODULAR - FOLLOWING RECEIPT OF REQUISITE SHAREHOLDER APPROVALS, ONTARIO SUPERIOR COURT OF JUSTICE GRANTED FINAL ORDER WITH RESPECT TO ARRANGEMENT * AUTOMODULAR CORP - UNDER ARRANGEMENT, HLS AND AMD WILL AMALGAMATE TO FORM A COMPANY TO BE NAMED “HLS THERAPEUTICS INC” * AUTOMODULAR - ONTARIO SUPERIOR COURT OF JUSTICE RULED $7 MILLION SETTLEMENT OF AMD’S LITIGATION WITH GENERAL MOTORS IS INCLUSIVE OF HST Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
